title: ESR’s HaloLock system offers a range of iPhone 13 accessories to take MagSafe further
author: sponsored
summary: The power of MagSafe in a world of possibilities.
article: The new iPhone 13 is the latest and greatest smartphone from Apple and it includes a fan-favorite technology brought back in the iPhone 12 series - MagSafe. Long-time case and accessory maker ESR has expanded their innovative HaloLock™ line of MagSafe compatible accessories for the entire family of iPhone 13 products.
Protection made easier
New for the iPhone 13 series, ESR is introducing a series of cases into their popular HaloLock™ series. There are a range of options to choose from so you can find something to meet your needs.
Classic with HaloLock™

If you want something that doesn’t rock the boat, or your wallet, too much, but still gives you full MagSafe compatibility, the Classic case is a great choice. It’s clear so you can continue to appreciate the phone’s design while adding some grip and extra protection to keep it safe. And at $26.99, it’s not a bad price either.
Air Armor with HaloLock™

If you want a little more protection for your new phone, the Air Armor adds military-grade protection while it’s clear finish still shows off the design of your phone. It can be yours for just a dollar more at $27.99.
Air Armor 360 with HaloLock™

The Air Armor 360 case covers both sides of the phone with an included tempered glass screen protector. If you’re looking for the ultimate protection, this is your best bet. It’ll set you back $32.99.
Cloud case
For something a little different, the Cloud case gives you a more traditional silicone design and some more color to the mix. It’s available in a nice Dark Green color for $29.99.
Metro case
Want to add even more style to your new phone? The Metro case is a leather case that is fully compatible with MagSafe and is quite affordable at $38.99.
Charging made easier
ESR also has a great selection of chargers in their HaloLock™ series as well.
Car charger

This car charger is compatible with most air vents and keeps your iPhone 13 secured with powerful magnets and can seamlessly rotate between portrait and landscape. It is the world’s first and Amazon’s No.1 MagSafe-compatible car charger that combines mount and wireless charger into one. Grab one on Amazon for $34.99.
Kickstand charger

This charger serves double duty. You can charge your phone wirelessly and prop it up with the kickstand so you can still watch your favorite videos or stay connected on a video chat. The removable cable means you can quickly unplug your phone and still keep the kickstand attached while you’re on the go.
Desk charger

If you’re looking for a way to wirelessly charge up your phone while at your desk, this adjustable stand is a great choice. It adjusts at 4 different pivot joints so you can set it right where you need it rotates 360 degrees. ESR also includes a 5 ft long cable for it so you can set it up anywhere.
Whether you’re looking for a protective case, or a more convenient way to charge your new iPhone 13, ESR has a wide range of MagSafe accessories in their HaloLock™ series.
